title: How to Save on New Super Mario Bros DS

steps.title: Play all of the levels before the Castle level.
steps.content: Play all of the levels before the Castle level.

steps.title: Go to the Mushroom house on the map.
steps.content: Go to the Mushroom house on the map.

steps.title: You will then be asked if you want to spend your Star Coins, select "Yes".
steps.content: You will then be asked if you want to spend your Star Coins, select "Yes".

steps.title: You will then be asked if you want to save, select "Yes".
steps.content: You will then be asked if you want to save, select "Yes".

steps.title: Beat the Final Castle.
steps.content: Beat the Final Castle. You can then save at any time.
